title: Futura / Avant Garde lookalike
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415194726im_/http:/typophile.com/files/B_YplZCUwAAvnt0_6287.jpg)

hi guys. what font is this eh? i tried futura / avant garde / gotham / brandon grotesque but didnt found a match.

the M seems very peculiar.
author: farissen

comments.content:
This appears to be a mix of several typefaces:

Avant Garde certainly works for |RIUS|, maybe with some mixing of widths to get that narrow |S|.

The |M| could be from one of the following:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nootype/radikal/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415194726/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nootype/radikal/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nootype/radikal/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontdiner/lionel-classic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415194726/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontdiner/lionel-classic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontdiner/lionel-classic/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/naked-power/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415194726/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/naked-power/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/naked-power/")

|IDEA| appears to be Caviar Dreams:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/caviar-dreams.font?text=IDEA](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415194726/http:/www.dafont.com/caviar-dreams.font?text=IDEA "http://www.dafont.com/caviar-dreams.font?text=IDEA")
